subject: Doping
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Astana cycling team has fired Vladimir Gusev, the time-trial champion, after its own antidoping program showed “irregular values” for some biological measures.
snippet: The Astana cycling team has fired Vladimir Gusev, the time-trial champion, after its own antidoping program showed “irregular values” for some biological measures.
